text: hamane yaqeenan apane paigambaron ko vaaze va raushan mojize dekar bheja aur unake saath kitaab aur (insaaf kee) taraazoo naazil kiya taaki log insaaf par qaayam rahe aur ham hee ne lohe ko naazil kiya jisake zarie se sakht ladaee aur logon ke bahut se naphe (kee baaten) hain aur taaki khuda dekh le ki bedekhe bhaale khuda aur usake rasoolon kee kaun madad karata hai beshak khuda bahut zabaradast gaalib hai
